message.content:
The most likely categories for the Safety 1st 2 Pack Cool Touch LED Nightlight are:

1) Baby Products: The nightlight is designed with child safety in mind, with features such as an enclosed bulb and the option to screw it directly into an outlet plate to prevent removal.

2) Home Improvement: The nightlight is designed to be screwed into an outlet plate, making it a fitting product for the home improvement category.

3) Office Products: While not the most likely category, the nightlight could also be considered an office product as it provides a soft comforting glow that could be used in a workspace.

4) Tools & Home Improvement: Similar to the home improvement category, the nightlight's design and functionality make it suitable for the tools and home improvement category.

5) Electronics: The nightlight utilizes LED technology and an auto-sensor, making it an electronic device.

Title: Safety 1st 2 Pack Cool Touch LED Nightlight
Content: 2 Pack, Safety 1st, Soothing Stars Auto Sensor Night Light, Automatically Turns On In The Dark & Off In The Light, Provides A Soft Comforting Glow, This Nightlight Automatically Goes On When It Is Dark & Off When There Is Sufficient Light, The Bulb Does Not Generate Any Heat. Enclosed Bulb, Prevents Child From Being Able To Touch The Bulb, Option To Screw Nightlight Directly Into Outlet Plate Prevents Removal Of Nightlight To Expose Outlet. Stars & Moon Shapes To Comfort The Child. Auto-Sensor,...
